name: Anby
agent_background:
"Burgers are truly a remarkable food — not just because I love them."

"See? They've got a balanced mix of nutrients, a portable design, and endless creative combinations that all somehow work perfectly."

"I'm convinced that burgers won't lose their value just because they can't go in a hot pot."

"Or... could it be that burgers might actually taste amazing in a hot pot?"

"I don't know... Seeing Anby back in this outfit stirs up such a mess of thoughts. memories come rushing in, like a piggy bank full of Dennies smashed open. As Anby would put it, isn't this what they call... a montage?"

— Nicole Demara

"No desire for praise or adoration, no thirst for blood on your blade... Could 'hatred' even find its place there?"

— Trigger

"Sixth Street isn't even that big — how has she never crossed paths with that spicy-food-loving girl?!"

— General Chop

"My despair and longing are merely a curse born from the moment your gaze fell upon me. You... You will break it, won't you?"

— Is It Life? A Hollow Shell? Or Merely A Sigh In The Eternal Night?

basic_attack.name: Penetrating Shock
basic_attack.description: Perform up to five slashes ahead, dealing Electric DMG. After the 4th attack hits the enemy, repeatedly press or hold Basic Attack to quickly pass through enemies in front up to 5 times.

dodge.name: Strobe
dodge.description:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Torrent
dash_attack.description: Perform a horizontal slash forward, then follow up with a thrust attack, dealing Electric DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Ground Flash Counter
dodge_counter.description:
Repeatedly slash enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

quick_assist.name: Cloud Flash
quick_assist.description:
Repeatedly slash enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

defensive_assist.name: Counter Surge
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Conducting Blow
assist_follow_up.description:
Dash forward and unleash a series of slashes at enemies ahead, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Celestial Thunder
special_attack.description:
Dash diagonally forward, then unleash a cross slash, dealing Electric DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Azure Flash
special_attack.description:
When Soldier 0 - Anby's attacks hit an enemy, they apply the Silver Star mark and charges the target
For every one-third of charge, the enemy receives 1 stack of White Thunder, stacking up to 3 times.
When the enemy has White Thunder, press Special Attack to activate:
Quickly dash forward, slashing through enemies and dealing multiple hits of Electric DMG.
When the skill hits an enemy, it will consume 1 stack of White Thunder to trigger an Aftershock that deals 1 extra instance of Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Thunder Smite
special_attack.description:
When the additional damage from White Thunder triggers 3 times on the same enemy:
A lightning strike will fall at the enemy's location, dealing Electric DMG to enemies within range.
This DMG is considered Aftershock DMG.

ex_special_attack.name: Sundering Bolt
ex_special_attack.description:
Combines her twin swords and throws them forward for a high-speed slash, dealing massive Electric DMG.
When the skill hits an enemy, it will fully charge Silver Star.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

chain_attack.name: Leaping Thunderstrike
chain_attack.description:
Leap forward, then quickly dive and perform a cross slash, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ultimate.name: Voidstrike
ultimate.description:
Perform a powerful series of slashes at a large area in front, followed by a lightning strike, dealing massive Electric DMG.
When the skill hits an enemy, it will fully charge Silver Star.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core_passive.name: Voltage Gap
core_passive.description: Soldier 0 - Anby's DMG against enemies with the Silver Star mark increases by 25%. After an enemy is marked with Silver Star, the CRIT DMG received from Aftershock attacks is further increased by 30% of Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT DMG.

additional_ability.name: Voltage Surge
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad is a Stun or Support character:
Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT Rate increases by 10%. When Soldier 0 - Anby is the active character, all squad members' Aftershock DMG to enemies with a Silver Star mark increases by 25%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Static Charge
mindscape_cinema.description: When Soldier 0 - Anby uses an EX Special Attack to hit an enemy, it triggers the additional DMG from White Thunder 3 times. This effect does not consume any White Thunder stacks.

mindscape_cinema.name: Fail-Safe Protocol
mindscape_cinema.description:
Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT Rate increases by 12%.
When she uses her Ultimate, she gains 6 stacks of Thunder's Cry (max 6 stacks).
With Thunder's Cry, when using Special Attack: Azure Flash to hit an enemy with White Thunder, it will consume 1 stack of Thunder's Cry instead.
Only 1 stack of Thunder's Cry will be consumed when a single use of a skill hits multiple enemies, and consuming Thunder's Cry will still activate the additional DMG from White Thunder.

mindscape_cinema.name: Past Glory
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Silver Reverb
mindscape_cinema.description: When hitting an enemy marked with Silver Star, Soldier 0 - Anby ignores 12% of the target's Electric RES.

mindscape_cinema.name: Director's Cut
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Prequel Protagonist
mindscape_cinema.description: Upon triggering 6 instances of White Thunder's additional DMG, an electromagnetic vortex will be generated, dealing 1,000% of Soldier 0 - Anby's ATK as Electric DMG against the target and surrounding enemies. This DMG is considered Aftershock DMG.
